channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: Knockdown Structure Fire; INC#1697; 09:53PM; 2921 E 8th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3H1iQSL; #BoyleHeights; First arriving 30 LAFD Firefighters took just 19 minutes to access, confine and fully extinguish flames in (the basement area? of) a two-story building containing a pair top floor apartments above a neighborhood market. No injury. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 25; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 CM20 CM22 E17 E2 E202 E209 E210 E9 EM1 RA17 RA25 SQ21 T10 T2 T9; CH9; 13; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire; INC#1697; 09:34PM; 2921 E 8th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3H1iQSL; #BoyleHeights; PRELIM: Fire in (the basement area? of) a two-story apartments over commercial (neighborhood market) building.; FS 25; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 CM20 CM22 E17 E2 E202 E209 E210 E9 EM1 RA17 RA25 T10 T2 T9; CH9; 13; Brian Humphrey

Fatality Traffic Collision; INC#0337; 07:37AM; EB 10 Fwy west of Manning Ave; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Ag1y0k; #Palms; PRELIM: Solo sedan off the roadway into a tree. Heavily damaged vehicle with one male deceased at scene. No other injuries reported. This incident may have occurred one or more days ago, and was possibly delayed in being reported to 9-1-1. No further details. Media Inquiries: CHP (Logs #29/ #586) and Coroner (Case #2023-04197).; FS 43; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 5; E43 RA43; CH4; Brian Humphrey

Traffic; INC#1646; 09:51PM; 1733 W Pacific Coast Hw; MAP: https://bit.ly/41MJtmt; Harbor City; Vehicle vs motorcycle. A total of two patients - driver from the vehicle was extricated (car was on its side) and transported in unknown condition. Motorcyclist transported in critical condition. Ages/genders unknown. 9-1-1 call was received at 9:35PM; FS 85; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC6 E238 E285 E38 E85 EM13 HR3 RA38 RA85 T38 T85; CH7; 13; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1044; 03:08PM; 320 S Evergreen Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/41I1Vww; Boyle Heights; KNOCKDOWN: 20 firefighters extinguished the fire in 12 minutes with no injuries reported. Fire attack conducted a transitional attack to address the heavy fire at the front of the home and then made entry to further the attack and fully extinguish the fire.; FS 2; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 E202 E4 E462 RA2 RA3 T2; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1044; 02:56PM; 320 S Evergreen Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/41I1Vww; Boyle Heights; One story, single family dwelling well involved in fire. Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 2; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 E202 E4 E462 RA2 T2; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Automobile Fire; INC#1617; 09:27PM; Eb 210 Fy; MAP: https://bit.ly/3d08pz0; Lake View Terrace; KNOCKDOWN: 22 firefighters extinguished the fire in 27 minutes with no injuries reported. The driver was the sole occupant of the motorhome and had no medical complaints. LAFD are picking up equipment and CHP will reopen all lanes of traffic once it is safe to do so. No further details.; FS 98; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 E24 E298 E77 E98 T98 WT77; CH8; 17; Margaret Stewart

Automobile Fire; INC#1617; 08:42PM; Eb 210 Fy; MAP: https://bit.ly/3d08pz0; Lake View Terrace; Large motorhome (Class A "Diesel pusher") fully involved in fire, towing a boat with propane tanks exploding. There are no injuries reported. CHP has closed EB210 Fwy at Osborne. 9-1-1 call was received at 8:42PM. The call was received as an auto fire and additional resources were requested by the fire officer. ; FS 98; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 E24 E298 E77 E98 T98 WT77; CH8; 17; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1679; 11:13PM; 602 W 53rd St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3GOrYKs; Vermont Square; KNOCKDOWN: The first arriving 18 firefighters extinguished the fire in 16 minutes with no injuries reported. The fire was contained to the converted attic of the single family dwelling. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details. ; FS 46; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC13 E266 E46 E66 RA46 T66; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1679; 10:57PM; 602 W 53rd St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3GOrYKs; Vermont Square; One story, single family dwelling with smoke showing from the attic. Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 46; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC13 E266 E46 E66 RA46 T66; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart
